oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-07-09 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 9, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performers the Willis Brothers, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1083rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Archie Campbell; Willis Brothers; Tommy Jackson; Jordanaires; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- I Know One (Jim Reeves) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Grant Turner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces the Willis Brothers -- Jenny Lou (Willis Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Tommy Jackson -- Sally Gooden (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner and Jim Reeves talk -- A Beautiful Life (Jim Reeves, Jordanaires) -- Jim Reeves introduces Chet Atkins -- Frankie And Johnny (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jones, Ramona; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Reeves, Jim; Willis Brothers; Willis, Guy, 1915-1981; Willis, Skeeter, -1976; Willis, Vic, -1995; Robbins, Marty
